titre: Snow break  in Val Thorens, the French ski resort that offers the best of skiing
contenu:
Discover the gourmet resort Val Thorens in the French Alps, you will be accommodated in the Junior Suite of a charming 5-stars hotel. 

After a scrumptious breakfast you will spend the day in the snow with a ski instructor and enjoy the magnificent mountain view. 

In the evening you can just relax and take advantage of the hotel’s wellness area which includes a swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna or you can have a good time in the luxurious bar of the hotel. Just lay back and watch us make your stay a an extraordinary experience.
